snippet.title: Project Kolo - First NPC and Building parts in the beginning
snippet.description:
http://gamejolt.com/games/rpg/project-kolo/32202/
This is the start on the Tutorial Island Area of the game. 
Not finished, but the Dialog, Highlight System, Weather, and Day/Night Cycle is set I think to where it will be.
The current DayNight Cycle is 900 seconds, or 15mins, per full day. We might lower this to around 10mins, but we will see how it goes as we progress.
The diffrence on this video and the game itself is the Dialog Screen aspect.
In the recording software we are using, Camtasia, it keeps the cursor active, so the game is still moving the camera with the cursor, in the game itself, a Dialog stops the Camera from following the cursor so in this example, walking into a room, triggering a dialog would remove camera controls.

http://gamejolt.com/games/rpg/project-kolo/32202/
This is the start on the Tutorial Island Area of the game. 
Not finished, but the Dialog, Highlight System, Weather, and Day/Night Cycle is set I think to where it will be.
The current DayNight Cycle is 900 seconds, or 15mins, per full day. We might lower this to around 10mins, but we will see how it goes as we progress.
The diffrence on this video and the game itself is the Dialog Screen aspect.
In the recording software we are using, Camtasia, it keeps the cursor active, so the game is still moving the camera with the cursor, in the game itself, a Dialog stops the Camera from following the cursor so in this example, walking into a room, triggering a dialog would remove camera controls.
